Message:
Something...feels warm...
Hands emitting golden light
were pressing against
the wound on my chest.

The hands belonged
to Miss Aura.
As our eyes met,
she gave a small smile...

“I’ve always wanted to
give you my thanks...!
Thank you, Miss Aura...!”

At those words,
Miss Aura’s smile
seemed to grow a bit sad,
and she hugged me
tightly to her...

When I came to,
I was in Miss Rustica’s arms.

The group of men
had all vanished.
Miss Aura was also
nowhere to be seen.

“Is Miss Aura gone...
because she healed me...?”

“No. You set her free.
And...me as well...”

I can’t let Miss Rustica
be all alone...!
I quickly reached out
my hand to her.

“Would you like to
travel the world with me?”

Miss Rustica’s eyes widened.
But, she then smiled softly,
and took my outstretched hand.

Gran... I...won’t stuff down
my grief any longer.

I’ll remember you
and my parents,
cry every last tear,
and then move forward again.

That way, I’m sure
I’ll be able to fly
freely once more...!
